author: mbk
msg: Fix issue 1453, "Configure fails when parent directory contains spaces".

author: blair
msg: Fix performance issue.  Previously, the portion of the repository
underneath the base URL supplied at the commend line was checked
out and if tags were used, then all tags would also be checked
out.  This wastes a lot of time and disk space.  Now only check
out the portion of the repository that is being loaded into and
only check out a tag after it has been created to do a consistency
When checking for the existence of directories in the repository,
connect to the repository directly instead of checking out a
working copy and stat'ing directory names.
If an existing working copy is specified, then check if it has a
Add more newlines in the output to make reading easier.
